duties_responsibilities.duty: Professionally represent the company as a brand ambassador and drive increased solar awareness.
Engage customers in company events and networking, offering them the company's services and solutions.
Meet team and individual sales goals set each month.
Collaborate with Appointment Coordinators to help them qualify leads, discuss the design of systems with Engineering, and close deals.
Develop and nurture relationships with internal teams and external partners.
Conduct solar seminars and events for 20 or more people in Solar Parties or other marketing events.
